response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly benefit your needs and goals. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its value to be significantly higher than $8,000. However, I understand that the true value is subjective and depends on your specific requirements. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment based on its high performance and longevity. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
